Code Snippets

This element is meant to be used to display code. When copy button is enabled users can easily copy snippet content to clipboard.

Default Code snippets load a copy button by default. It's useful for users to easily copy the entire code. 
<IfModule mod_rewrite.c>
RewriteEngine On
RewriteBase /
RewriteRule ^index\.php$ - [L]
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-d
RewriteRule . /index.php [L]
</IfModule>
											
<pre class="sui-code-snippet">
	... content goes here ...
</pre>
No-Copy Button There are cases when you gonna need to get rid off the copy button. 
<IfModule mod_rewrite.c>
RewriteEngine On
RewriteBase /
RewriteRule ^index\.php$ - [L]
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-d
RewriteRule . /index.php [L]
</IfModule>
											
<pre class="sui-code-snippet sui-no-copy">
	... content goes here ...
</pre>
